description: This file contains CSS styles for theming and layout of the application, including light and dark theme variables, styling for the main application components, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling including background color, text color, and layout settings.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including size and animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application with responsive flexbox layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling within the application to match theme colors.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning and hover effects.
